sentences.en: A canny bureaucratic infighter , Moorer made no pretense of academic subtlety.
sentences.cn: 穆勒是个机警的官场角逐者, 但他并不装作高深莫测.

sentences.en: He argued his case with considerable subtlety.
sentences.cn: 他相当机敏地为自己的论点辩护.

sentences.en: He has shown enormous strength, great intelligence and great subtlety.
sentences.cn: 他表现出充沛的精力 、 极大的智慧,和高度的灵活性.

sentences.en: His subtlety could not avail him here.
sentences.cn: 他精明机智在这里无济于事了.

sentences.en: In time you'll appreciate the beauty and subtlety of this language.
sentences.cn: 总有一天你会体会到这门语言的优美和微妙之处。

sentences.en: It's a thrilling movie even though it lacks subtlety.
sentences.cn: 这部电影虽说不算精巧，但还是扣人心弦的。

sentences.en: Lucy was a remarkable creation , as full of loveliness and subtlety as any work of art.
sentences.cn: 露西是个非凡的美女, 就象一件精巧的,让人爱不释手的工艺品.

sentences.en: Many of the resulting wines lack the subtlety of the original model.
sentences.cn: 许多如此酿制的葡萄酒都不像最初的葡萄酒那样耐人品味。

sentences.en: Philosophy's queerest arguments tickle agreeably our sense of subtlety and ingenuity.
sentences.cn: 哲学上最奇怪的议点也会愉快地引起我们微妙机敏的感觉.

sentences.en: She analyses herself with great subtlety.
sentences.cn: 她非常敏锐地分析自己。

sentences.en: She argued her case with considerable subtlety.
sentences.cn: 她非常巧妙地为自己的论点辩护。

sentences.en: Subtlety is one of the arts of both diplomacy and statecraft.
sentences.cn: 微妙莫测是外交和政治手腕艺术之一.

sentences.en: The charms of their subtlety passed by her unappreciated.
sentences.cn: 话里的微妙刻薄意味,她一概不能领会.

sentences.en: Those curious unpictured sins whose very mystery lent them their subtlety and their charm.
sentences.cn: 这是些异乎寻常,无从描述的罪恶,就是它们的神秘性使它们难以捉摸而又具有魅力.

sentences.en: Traditional Russian hospitality was in this case blended with legendary Soviet subtlety.
sentences.cn: 在这里,俄国人传统的好客同苏联人出名的狡猾溶为一体.

words.tran_cn: 微妙的；精细的；敏感的；狡猾的；稀薄的

trans.tran_cn: 精妙，巧妙，敏锐，敏感，狡猾，阴险，细微的差别等
trans.tran_en: a thought, idea, or detail that is important but difficult to notice or understand
